articles.description: The 17-year-old has already managed to bag a silver medal in the 10m synchronised platform competition and gold in the 10m platform diving event.
articles.content:
Fred Sirieix's champion diver daughter Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix has added to her medal tally on the final day of the Commonwealth Games on Monday.
The 17-year-old has already managed to bag a silve… [+22585 chars]
